Package suncertify.client

This package contains classes for the URLyBird client, including model, view and controller classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ServerShutDownListener A listener that is notified when the server is about to stop.
TableSelectionListener A listener that listens to table row selection changes.
 

Class Summary
ClientController MVC controller for URLyBird client.
ClientMenuBar Menu bar for URLyBird client GUI.
ClientModel Client MVC model.
ClientToolbar Toolbar for URLyBird client GUI.
ClientView Main application GUI for URLyBird application when running in "client" or "standalone" mode.
RMIServerToClientConnection An RMI implementation of the methods that a server can invoke on a client that is connected to it.
SearchResultsTable The table containing the client's search results.
SearchResultsTableCellRenderer Renderer for the table of search results.
StandaloneServerToClientConnection A standalone implementation of the methods that a server can invoke on a client that is connected to it.
 

Enum Summary
ClientMenuBar.Commands The commands contained by this menu bar.
ClientToolbar.Commands The commands provided by this toolbar.
ClientView.Commands The commands provided by buttons in the main client GUI panel.
SearchResultsTable.Commands The commands associated with this table.
 

Package suncertify.client Description

This package contains classes for the URLyBird client, including model, view and controller classes. The client can be run in standalone or network mode. When in standalone mode, the server is also started, and the client is directly connected to it. The server GUI will not be displayed. Standalone and network modes are similar, but standalone mode does not involve any network communication.
